activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13383
activity.text: Hey Team @Jacobjeevan @rithviknishad , Hi , I noticed this issue is already assigned, but I’ve implemented a fix locally. If the current assignee isn’t actively working on it, I’d be happy to open a PR and contribute. Please let me know if that would be helpful. My plan is to ensure that both the checkbox and its accompanying text are properly aligned for a cleaner, more consistent UI. I’ll be using appropriate Tailwind CSS utility classes to fix vertical and horizontal alignment while maintaining responsiveness and accessibility. The changes are already implemented and tested locally — I can open a PR as soon as I get the go-ahead. Thanks for your time and effort in maintaining this project — have a great day!
